Title: Bernie Sanders Reveals the AI ‘Doomsday Scenario’ That Worries Top Experts
Description: The Vermont senator discusses his fears that artificial intelligence will only enrich the billionaire class, the fight for a 32-hour work week, and the ‘doomsday scenario’ that has some of the world’s top experts deeply concerned.

Title: 59 Palestinians in Gaza are killed by Israeli airstrikes or shot dead while seeking aid
Description: At least 31 Palestinians were fatally shot on their way to an aid distribution site in the Gaza Strip on Saturday, while Israeli airstrikes killed at least 28 Palestinians.

Title: Wilson lifts Aces to victory with 34 points in return
